name: visualizacion-barrios
description: Mapa coropl√©tico de barrios de CABA para Looker Studio

scripts.deploy:js: npm run build && gsutil -h "Content-Type: application/javascript" -h "Cache-Control: no-store" cp dist/Visualization.js gs://mapa-barrios-degcba/dist/Visualization.js
scripts.deploy:assets: gsutil -h "Content-Type: application/json" -h "Cache-Control: no-store" cp Config.json gs://mapa-barrios-degcba/Config.json && gsutil -h "Content-Type: application/json" -h "Cache-Control: no-store" cp manifest.json gs://mapa-barrios-degcba/manifest.json
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:js && npm run deploy:assets && npm run deploy:geojson && npm run deploy:cors
